org.archive.wayback.resourceindex.cdxserver

Class APContextAuthToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.archive.cdxserver.auth.AuthToken
      • org.archive.wayback.resourceindex.cdxserver.APContextAuthToken

  • public class APContextAuthToken
extends AuthToken
    Variant of AuthToken used to pass AccessPoint reference to AuthChecker implementations. Primary purpose is to configure CDXAccessFilter with AccessPoint-dependent information, such as AccessPoint.getFileIncludePrefixes().

    TODO: Considering AuthToken represents a user, it sounds like a bad design to have it carry target context information. It is in fact resulting in counter-intuitive data flow. Refactor the CDXServer interface.

    See Also:
    EmbeddedCDXServerIndex.createAuthToken(org.archive.wayback.core.WaybackRequest, String), WaybackAPAuthChecker
